summary: Diff implements frontend-side admin route guarding and various UI/theme/layout changes, plus additional hooks/pages updates to address build issues. However, the required generated 5D background image assets are not evidenced as added, and backend support for a stable admin-check method is not clearly evidenced in the truncated backend diff. Several unrelated feature enhancements (not requested) appear to have been introduced (notably a greatly expanded HeroHelper/AI assistant and people-free homepage background changes).

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a stable admin-check method used by the frontend (e.g., the actor method checked by useIsCallerAdmin) and it returns correct values for admin vs non-admin callers.
missing_requirements.reason: Frontend now calls actor.isCallerAdmin() (via useIsCallerAdmin) and App routes are wrapped with AdminRouteGuard, but the backend diff shown is truncated and does not provide evidence that a public isCallerAdmin method exists and is correct.

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and include the required futuristic 5D-style background image set as static frontend assets under frontend/public/assets/generated (default-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, admin-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, finance-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, commerce-bg.dim_1920x1080.png, chat-bg.dim_1920x1080.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary shows no added files and provides no evidence that these PNG assets were created under frontend/public/assets/generated.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (mentions Layout/background classes but not the required image files being added)

hallucinated_features.description: Major expansion of HeroHelper into a floating AI assistant with voice capabilities, memory system, time-zone greetings, background monitoring mode, and comprehensive platform knowledge.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by any requirement; BuildRequest explicitly limits scope to admin access, overlap fixes, deployment/build reliability, and background assets.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/HeroHelper.tsx": Enhanced floating AI assistant with click-to-position functionality, full voice capabilities, memory system, ...)

hallucinated_features.description: Homepage/Hero background image changes emphasizing 'verified people-free' backgrounds and updated badge text ("Streaming to 134 Countries Worldwide").
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; background requirements were specifically for the 5 named area backgrounds (admin/finance/commerce/chat/default), not additional homepage hero/background asset swaps or marketing copy changes.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx": updated badge ... using ... "homepage-hero-v40-people-free..."; "frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx": updated to use exclusively verified people-free background images ...)
